item.title: Notion Database Views in Obsidian (Live)
item.description:
Have you ever wanted rotating Notion database views in Obsidian? Marcus Olsson’s Obsidian Projects plugin does exactly that, letting you create Table, Board, Calendar, and Gallery views for the same notes in Obsidian, just like in Notion! Join us as Marcus shows us how this awesome new plugin works and how it can be used to display the same data in different ways.

Resources

  • Marcus’s post on the plugin
  • The Obsidian Projects GitHub repo
  • The Projects roadmap
  • My video on the old way to create a Content Calendar in Obsidian

item.title: Notion vs Obsidian - Databases vs Dataview
item.description: Notion and Obsidian are similar in many ways, but they have a fundamental difference in philosophy and the way they structure notes. In this video, I talk about structure as well as Notion databases vs. Obsidian’s Dataview plugin, and tell you why I ultimately ended up with Obsidian.

item.title: Creating a Content Calendar in Obsidian
item.description:
Despite the fact that I’ve long given up using Notion as my main note-taking tool, I’ve still continued to use it as a content calendar. Obsidian just hadn’t caught up with it in terms of functionality… until now.

In this video, I show my current Obsidian workflow for creating and maintaining a content calendar.
